text:
Set it up in a similar way to how pylint is:
- [ ] docs.astroid.org is using ReadTheDocs for building the documentation
- [ ] add ReadTheDocs badge in README
- [ ] format the Changelog in a similar way to how the Pylint's ChangeLog is now
- [ ] add a `What's new` section
title: Setup readthedocs for astroid
clean_text: set similar way pylint docsastroidorg use readthedoc build document add readthedoc badg readm format changelog similar way pylint changelog add section
